name: Shih Tzu
description: The Shih Tzu is affectionate, charming, and playful — a perfect lapdog companion. Known for its elegant long coat and loving temperament, this breed thrives on human attention and gentle care.

adaptability.description: Shih Tzus adapt well to indoor living. Keep them cool in hot weather and cozy during winters as their short muzzle makes temperature regulation tricky.

diet.title: DIET
diet.mainDescription: Shih Tzus thrive on a balanced, nutrient-rich diet tailored for small breeds to maintain coat shine, dental health, and overall vitality.

tips.title: Small-bite kibble
tips.description: Choose food designed for small jaws and sensitive digestion with 20–25% protein content.

tips.title: Omega-rich nutrition
tips.description: Include Omega-3 and Omega-6 fatty acids to maintain a shiny, healthy coat and prevent skin dryness.

tips.title: Dental-friendly snacks
tips.description: Provide crunchy treats or dental chews to help reduce tartar buildup common in small breeds.

tips.title: Hydration & portion control
tips.description: Ensure fresh water at all times and feed small, frequent meals to prevent bloating or overeating.

training.title: SHIH TZU TRAINING
training.mainDescription: Shih Tzus respond best to positive reinforcement, gentle commands, and short fun sessions that match their playful temperament.

tips.title: Consistency is key
tips.description: Train daily for 10–15 minutes with praise and small treats to keep them focused and happy.

tips.title: Socialization & house training
tips.description: Expose your Shih Tzu to different people and pets early, and use consistent routines for housebreaking.

grooming.title: GROOMING
grooming.subtitle: Shih Tzus have long, luxurious coats that require frequent grooming to prevent tangles and maintain their elegant look.
grooming.mainDescription: Shih Tzus need daily brushing, regular trimming, and consistent hygiene for coat health and comfort.

tips.title: Daily brushing
tips.description: Use a soft brush or comb to detangle hair gently and prevent matting, especially around the ears and legs.

tips.title: Eye & face care
tips.description: Clean tear stains daily and trim facial hair to keep the eyes clean and free from irritation.
